name: Skatezbording Simulator 2034
description:
Do you like skatezbording?

Either way, this is the game for you!

It has:

  • Graphics
  • Player
  • Gameplay
  • Skatezbord
  • And more! (probably)

Controls: 'Left' & 'right' arrow keys to move,

                     'Up' or 'Z' to jump,

                     and 'down' to crouch.

(Oh yeah, and feel free to make videos and such concerning this game.)
